name: CONTACT_TYPE_DEPENDENCY
description: Establishes a dependency where the 'ContactTypeText' (e.g., NOTIFICATION, STANDARD) determines the type of contact and influences the structure and purpose of the associated 'Phone' and 'EmailAddress' nodes.
prompt: Ensure that the <ContactTypeText> in each <ContactInfo> node is valid and that the structure of the associated <Phone> and <EmailAddress> nodes aligns with the specified contact type.
